metadata.name: Financial Services: Pub/Sub JSON to Pub/Sub VWAP
metadata.description: Stream VWAP for JSON records from Pub/Sub to Pub/Sub

parameters.name: inputTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub input topic
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Pub/Sub topic to consume from. The name should be in the format of projects/<project-id>/topics/<topic-name>.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.label: Time interval for VWAP window
parameters.helpText: The time interval, in seconds, for the VWAP lookback window. For a 5 minute VWAP window, specify 300

parameters.name: priceFieldName
parameters.label: Price field name
parameters.helpText: The field name to use in the payload for the price

parameters.name: volumeFieldName
parameters.label: Volume field name
parameters.helpText: The field name to use in the payload for the volume

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub input topic
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Pub/Sub topic to publish to. The name should be in the format of projects/<project-id>/topics/<topic-name>.

parameters.name: enablePrintMetricsToLogs
parameters.label: Enable printing metrics to logs
parameters.helpText: Enable printing metrics to logs. For example true or false

parameters.name: enablePrintTFExamplesToLogs
parameters.label: BEnable printing output to logs
parameters.helpText: Enable printing output to logs. For example true or false
